'''Surfpiercer''' is a part of the [[Summertime Odyssey]] event. It is unlocked after completing [[Summertime Odyssey: I]].

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Surfpiercer 1.png
|text1  = During the Surfpiercer Challenge, your Waverider will {{Color|help|gather a certain amount of Piercer's Drive}}. Once this charging process is complete, you can activate a more powerful Surfpiercer's Surge. This ability {{Color|help|can have a maximum of 3 stacks}}.
|image2 = Tutorial Surfpiercer 2.png
|text2  = Use the special Coalesce ability during the challenge to gather all available Piercer's Drive within a certain AoE.
|image3 = Tutorial Surfpiercer 3.png
|text3  = When you use the Surfpiercer's Surge, the Waverider will become capable of destroying certain obstacles along the track. You can use this method to find some hidden shortcuts.<br />The destructible obstacles are: {{Color|help|small and large composite obstacles, fences, hot air balloons, and small floating towers}}.
|image4 = Tutorial Surfpiercer 4.png
|text4  = Some of the obstacles cannot be destroyed by Surfpiercer's Surge. These indestructible obstacles are: {{Color|help|large floating towers, transport balloons, reefs, and seaborne ruins}}.
|image5 = Tutorial Surfpiercer 5.png
|text5  = During the Surfpiercer challenge, you must navigate your Waverider and follow the objective markers to pass through {{Color|help|golden}} track banners en route to the final destination...
}}
